creator: East Side Games Studio
descriptionHtml:
Help Adam, Barry, and Erica Goldberg get to the top of their school’s “Cool List” and become the most popular kids in town!

Based on the hit comedy TV show, The Goldbergs is an idle game where you build your popularity by managing the social life of a teenager in the 80s.

Tap to collect Cool Points, get Friends, and become totally popular! Upgrade your hangouts to get cool quick and become the top of the teenage food chain in Jenkintown!

As the true king or queen of the social ladder, you'll collect characters straight from the TV show to help generate coolness and open new hangouts. Get new characters by collecting cards, then level them up by collecting vhs tapes, arcade tokens, and sunglasses!

Coolness is key to completing the popularity challenges and climbing the Cool List! But don't get too comfortable at the top - your beloved "smother" Beverly is always trying to "help" and one wrong step will get your embarrassed by your parents. You'll go from ruling the mall to hiding out in the computer lab faster than you can say "gag me with a spoon"!

Tap your way through boss fights against Beverly, Murray, and even Coach Mellor. As hard as you try to be cool, you'll lose it all at the end of each episode. But don’t have a cow, you’ll be rewarded with some choice 80s nostalgia to decorate your bedroom!

AN IDLE ADVENTURE WITH NEVER ENDING FUN
Follow hilarious characters through comedic cutscenes with plotlines and characters straight from the tv show. Even better - new stories are always being added!

MAKE FRIENDS AND GET POPULAR
Build and manage activities alongside Jenkintown's radical residents. From classic 80s activities like Hanging at the Mall or watching The Big Game to others straight from “The Goldbergs” TV show like Smashball and 80s Movie Parodies!

IDLE TYCOON FUN
Too lazy to work? No duh, so are we! Join in the idle game fun when you collect cards and characters to automate your hangouts. The game plays itself while you're away! Become a true idle tycoon.

Join the The Goldbergs' Adam, Erica, and Barry on a quest to be cool and relive a world of acid-washed jeans, giant cell phones, and huge hair!

---------------

The Goldbergs TM & © 2020 Sony Pictures Television Inc. All Rights Reserved.

Please note that The Goldbergs: Back to the 80s is free-to-play experience (F2P), but some game items are available for purchase using real money.

Contact Us - goldbergsgame@lumen.games
Terms of Service - https://service-terms.eastsidegames.com
Privacy Policy - https://privacy-policy.eastsidegames.com/
descriptionShort: 📺 The totally awesome 80s idle game based on the hit TV show! 📺

descriptionHtml:
Help Adam, Barry, and Erica Goldberg get to the top of their school’s “Cool List” and become the most popular kids in town!

The official idle tap game of The Goldbergs hit comedy TV show. The Goldbergs: Back to the 80s is an idle game where you build your popularity by managing the social life of the Goldbergs teenagers Adam, Barry and Erica in the 80s.

Tap to collect Cool Points, make Friends, and become totally popular in this narrative driven idle game! Upgrade and automate your idle hangouts to shoot straight to the top of the teenage food chain in Jenkintown!

Were you ever popular in high school? Ever make it to the top of the Cool List? Now's your chance! As the true king or queen of the social ladder, you'll collect and upgrade characters straight from the TV show and boost your cool rating to open new hangouts. Get new characters by collecting cards, then level them up by collecting nostalgic 80s themed items like vhs tapes, arcade tokens, and sunglasses!

Your cool rating is key to completing the idle game popularity challenges and climbing the Cool List! But don't get too comfortable at the top - your beloved "smother" Beverly is always trying to "help" and one wrong step will leave you embarrassed by your parents, at the bottom of the cool list! You'll go from ruling the mall to hiding out in the computer lab faster than you can say "gag me with a spoon"!

Tap your way through 80s themed arcade stye boss fights against Beverly, Murray, and even Coach Mellor. As hard as you try to be cool, you'll lose it all at the end of each episode. But don’t have a cow, you’ll be rewarded with some choice 80s nostalgia to decorate your bedroom!

IDLE ADVENTURE SET IN THE 80s WITH NEVER ENDING FUN
Follow hilariously relatable characters through comedic cutscenes with plotlines and characters straight from the tv show. Relive the life you had, or wish you had as a teenager in the 80s. Whenever you need your 80s fix, new stories and live-events are always being added to The Goldbergs idle game!

TAKE PART IN 80s THEMED LIVE EVENTS
Ramp the nostalgia levels to the max with free and addicting time-limited events. Think you can jump to the top of the Cool List by becoming the Smashball campion? Can you defeat your enemies to rule the arcade? Play and tap through hilarious live events to win prizes that will help you become the coolest teenager in school.

WHO NEEDS MONEY? MAKE FRIENDS AND BECOME POPULAR
Click and tap to build and manage activities alongside Jenkintown's radical residents. From classic 80s activities like Hanging at the Mall or watching The Big Game to others straight from “The Goldbergs” TV show like Smashball and 80s Movie Parodies!

FREE IDLE TYCOON FUN
Join in the tap and idle games fun where you collect cards and characters to boost your cool rating. Too lazy to work? No duh, so are we! Join in the idle game fun when you collect cards and characters to automate your hangouts. The game plays itself while you're away! Become a true idle tycoon.

Join The Goldbergs' Adam, Erica, and Barry on a free idle quest to be cool and relive a world of acid-washed jeans, giant cell phones, and huge hair!

---------------

The Goldbergs TM & © 2020 Sony Pictures Television Inc. All Rights Reserved.

Please note that The Goldbergs: Back to the 80s is free-to-play experience (F2P), but some game items are available for purchase using real money.

title: The Goldbergs: Back to the 80s

V5Z 3X7

creator: East Side Games Studio
descriptionHtml:
Help Adam, Barry, and Erica Goldberg get to the top of their school’s “Cool List” and become the most popular kids in town!

The official idle tap game of The Goldbergs hit comedy TV show. The Goldbergs: Back to the 80s is an idle game where you build your popularity by managing the social life of the Goldbergs teenagers Adam, Barry and Erica in the 80s.

Tap to collect Cool Points, make Friends, and become totally popular in this narrative driven idle game! Upgrade and automate your idle hangouts to shoot straight to the top of the teenage food chain in Jenkintown!

Were you ever popular in high school? Ever make it to the top of the Cool List? Now's your chance! As the true king or queen of the social ladder, you'll collect and upgrade characters straight from the TV show and boost your cool rating to open new hangouts. Get new characters by collecting cards, then level them up by collecting nostalgic 80s themed items like vhs tapes, arcade tokens, and sunglasses!

Your cool rating is key to completing the idle game popularity challenges and climbing the Cool List! But don't get too comfortable at the top - your beloved "smother" Beverly is always trying to "help" and one wrong step will leave you embarrassed by your parents, at the bottom of the cool list! You'll go from ruling the mall to hiding out in the computer lab faster than you can say "gag me with a spoon"!

Tap your way through 80s themed arcade stye boss fights against Beverly, Murray, and even Coach Mellor. As hard as you try to be cool, you'll lose it all at the end of each episode. But don’t have a cow, you’ll be rewarded with some choice 80s nostalgia to decorate your bedroom!

IDLE ADVENTURE SET IN THE 80s WITH NEVER ENDING FUN
Follow hilariously relatable characters through comedic cutscenes with plotlines and characters straight from the tv show. Relive the life you had, or wish you had as a teenager in the 80s. Whenever you need your 80s fix, new stories and live-events are always being added to The Goldbergs idle game!

TAKE PART IN 80s THEMED LIVE EVENTS
Ramp the nostalgia levels to the max with free and addicting time-limited events. Think you can jump to the top of the Cool List by becoming the Smashball campion? Can you defeat your enemies to rule the arcade? Play and tap through hilarious live events to win prizes that will help you become the coolest teenager in school.

WHO NEEDS MONEY? MAKE FRIENDS AND BECOME POPULAR
Click and tap to build and manage activities alongside Jenkintown's radical residents. From classic 80s activities like Hanging at the Mall or watching The Big Game to others straight from “The Goldbergs” TV show like Smashball and 80s Movie Parodies!

FREE IDLE TYCOON FUN
Join in the tap and idle games fun where you collect cards and characters to boost your cool rating. Too lazy to work? No duh, so are we! Join in the idle game fun when you collect cards and characters to automate your hangouts. The game plays itself while you're away! Become a true idle tycoon.

Join The Goldbergs' Adam, Erica, and Barry on a free idle quest to be cool and relive a world of acid-washed jeans, giant cell phones, and huge hair!

---------------

The Goldbergs TM & © 2020 Sony Pictures Television Inc. All Rights Reserved.

Please note that The Goldbergs: Back to the 80s is free-to-play experience (F2P), but some game items are available for purchase using real money.

Contact Us - goldbergsgame@lumen.games
Terms of Service - https://service-terms.eastsidegames.com
Privacy Policy - https://privacy-policy.eastsidegames.com/

creator: East Side Games Studio
descriptionHtml:
Help Adam, Barry, and Erica Goldberg get to the top of their school’s “Cool List” and become the most popular kids in town!

The official idle tap game of The Goldbergs hit comedy TV show. The Goldbergs: Back to the 80s is an idle game where you build your popularity by managing the social life of the Goldbergs teenagers Adam, Barry and Erica in the 80s.

Tap to collect Cool Points, make Friends, and become totally popular in this narrative driven idle game! Upgrade and automate your idle hangouts to shoot straight to the top of the teenage food chain in Jenkintown!

Were you ever popular in high school? Ever make it to the top of the Cool List? Now's your chance! As the true king or queen of the social ladder, you'll collect and upgrade characters straight from the TV show and boost your cool rating to open new hangouts. Get new characters by collecting cards, then level them up by collecting nostalgic 80s themed items like vhs tapes, arcade tokens, and sunglasses!

Your cool rating is key to completing the idle game popularity challenges and climbing the Cool List! But don't get too comfortable at the top - your beloved "smother" Beverly is always trying to "help" and one wrong step will leave you embarrassed by your parents, at the bottom of the cool list! You'll go from ruling the mall to hiding out in the computer lab faster than you can say "gag me with a spoon"!

Tap your way through 80s themed arcade stye boss fights against Beverly, Murray, and even Coach Mellor. As hard as you try to be cool, you'll lose it all at the end of each episode. But don’t have a cow, you’ll be rewarded with some choice 80s nostalgia to decorate your bedroom!

IDLE ADVENTURE SET IN THE 80s WITH NEVER ENDING FUN
Follow hilariously relatable characters through comedic cutscenes with plotlines and characters straight from the tv show. Relive the life you had, or wish you had as a teenager in the 80s. Whenever you need your 80s fix, new stories and live-events are always being added to The Goldbergs idle game!

TAKE PART IN 80s THEMED LIVE EVENTS
Ramp the nostalgia levels to the max with free and addicting time-limited events. Think you can jump to the top of the Cool List by becoming the Smashball campion? Can you defeat your enemies to rule the arcade? Play and tap through hilarious live events to win prizes that will help you become the coolest teenager in school.

WHO NEEDS MONEY? MAKE FRIENDS AND BECOME POPULAR
Click and tap to build and manage activities alongside Jenkintown's radical residents. From classic 80s activities like Hanging at the Mall or watching The Big Game to others straight from “The Goldbergs” TV show like Smashball and 80s Movie Parodies!

FREE IDLE TYCOON FUN
Join in the tap and idle games fun where you collect cards and characters to boost your cool rating. Too lazy to work? No duh, so are we! Join in the idle game fun when you collect cards and characters to automate your hangouts. The game plays itself while you're away! Become a true idle tycoon.

Join The Goldbergs' Adam, Erica, and Barry on a free idle quest to be cool and relive a world of acid-washed jeans, giant cell phones, and huge hair!

---------------

The Goldbergs TM & © 2020 Sony Pictures Television Inc. All Rights Reserved.

Please note that The Goldbergs: Back to the 80s is free-to-play experience (F2P), but some game items are available for purchase using real money.

Terms of Service - https://service-terms.eastsidegames.com
Privacy Policy - https://privacy-policy.eastsidegames.com/

Help Adam, Barry, and Erica Goldberg get to the top of their school’s “Cool List” and become the most popular kids in town!

The official idle tap game of The Goldbergs hit comedy TV show. The Goldbergs: Back to the 80s is an idle game where you build your popularity by managing the social life of the Goldbergs teenagers Adam, Barry and Erica in the 80s.

Tap to collect Cool Points, make Friends, and become totally popular in this narrative driven idle game! Upgrade and automate your idle hangouts to shoot straight to the top of the teenage food chain in Jenkintown!

Were you ever popular in high school? Ever make it to the top of the Cool List? Now's your chance! As the true king or queen of the social ladder, you'll collect and upgrade characters straight from the TV show and boost your cool rating to open new hangouts. Get new characters by collecting cards, then level them up by collecting nostalgic 80s themed items like vhs tapes, arcade tokens, and sunglasses!

Your cool rating is key to completing the idle game popularity challenges and climbing the Cool List! But don't get too comfortable at the top - your beloved "smother" Beverly is always trying to "help" and one wrong step will leave you embarrassed by your parents, at the bottom of the cool list! You'll go from ruling the mall to hiding out in the computer lab faster than you can say "gag me with a spoon"!

Tap your way through 80s themed arcade stye boss fights against Beverly, Murray, and even Coach Mellor. As hard as you try to be cool, you'll lose it all at the end of each episode. But don’t have a cow, you’ll be rewarded with some choice 80s nostalgia to decorate your bedroom!

IDLE ADVENTURE SET IN THE 80s WITH NEVER ENDING FUN
Follow hilariously relatable characters through comedic cutscenes with plotlines and characters straight from the tv show. Relive the life you had, or wish you had as a teenager in the 80s. Whenever you need your 80s fix, new stories and live-events are always being added to The Goldbergs idle game!

TAKE PART IN 80s THEMED LIVE EVENTS
Ramp the nostalgia levels to the max with free and addicting time-limited events. Think you can jump to the top of the Cool List by becoming the Smashball campion? Can you defeat your enemies to rule the arcade? Play and tap through hilarious live events to win prizes that will help you become the coolest teenager in school.

WHO NEEDS MONEY? MAKE FRIENDS AND BECOME POPULAR
Click and tap to build and manage activities alongside Jenkintown's radical residents. From classic 80s activities like Hanging at the Mall or watching The Big Game to others straight from “The Goldbergs” TV show like Smashball and 80s Movie Parodies!

FREE IDLE TYCOON FUN
Join in the tap and idle games fun where you collect cards and characters to boost your cool rating. Too lazy to work? No duh, so are we! Join in the idle game fun when you collect cards and characters to automate your hangouts. The game plays itself while you're away! Become a true idle tycoon.

Join The Goldbergs' Adam, Erica, and Barry on a free idle quest to be cool and relive a world of acid-washed jeans, giant cell phones, and huge hair!

---------------

The Goldbergs TM & © 2020 Sony Pictures Television Inc. All Rights Reserved.

Please note that The Goldbergs: Back to the 80s is free-to-play experience (F2P), but some game items are available for purchase using real money.

Contact Us - goldbergsgame@lumen.games
Terms of Service - https://service-terms.eastsidegames.com
Privacy Policy - https://privacy-policy.eastsidegames.com/
descriptionShort: 📺 The totally awesome 80s themed idle game based on the hit TV show! 📺

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hey Goldbergs fans, we’re going back to the 80s for even more fun. In this release, we have:

- Rewards on Event Leaderboards!
- Gift & Message notifications on the bottom HUD
- Performance improvements on late episodes (after 30)
- General bug fixes and 80s touches

Have fun and join our community at http://www.facebook.com/goldbergsgame and let us know how we can make the game even better for you!

As the true king or queen of the social ladder, you'll collect and upgrade characters straight from the TV show and boost your cool rating to open new hangouts. Get new characters by collecting cards, then level them up by collecting nostalgic 80s themed items like vhs tapes, arcade tokens, and sunglasses!

Your cool rating is key to completing the idle game popularity challenges and climbing the Cool List! But don't get too comfortable at the top - your beloved "smother" Beverly is always trying to "help" and one wrong step will leave you embarrassed by your parents, at the bottom of the cool list! You'll go from ruling the mall to hiding out in the computer lab faster than you can say "gag me with a spoon"!

Tap your way through 80s themed arcade style boss fights against Beverly, Murray, and even Coach Mellor. As hard as you try to be cool, you'll lose it all at the end of each episode. But don’t have a cow, you’ll be rewarded with some choice 80s nostalgia to decorate your bedroom!

IDLE ADVENTURE SET IN THE 80s WITH NEVER ENDING FUN
Follow hilariously relatable characters through comedic cutscenes with plotlines and characters straight from the tv show. Relive the life you had, or wish you had as a teenager in the 80s. Whenever you need your 80s fix, new stories and live-events are always being added to The Goldbergs idle game!

TAKE PART IN 80s THEMED LIVE EVENTS
Ramp the nostalgia levels to the max with free and addicting time-limited events. Think you can jump to the top of the Cool List by becoming the Smashball campion? Can you defeat your enemies to rule the arcade? Play and tap through hilarious live events to win prizes that will help you become the coolest teenager in school.

WHO NEEDS MONEY? MAKE FRIENDS AND BECOME POPULAR
Click and tap to build and manage activities alongside Jenkintown's radical residents. From classic 80s activities like Hanging at the Mall or watching The Big Game to others straight from “The Goldbergs” TV show like Smashball and 80s Movie Parodies!

FREE IDLE TYCOON FUN
Join in the tap and idle games fun where you collect cards and characters to boost your cool rating. Too lazy to work? No duh, so are we! Join in the idle game fun when you collect cards and characters to automate your hangouts. The game plays itself while you're away! Become a true idle tycoon.

Join The Goldbergs' Adam, Erica, and Barry on a free idle quest to be cool and relive a world of acid-washed jeans, giant cell phones, and huge hair!

---------------

The Goldbergs TM & © 2020 Sony Pictures Television Inc. All Rights Reserved.

Please note that The Goldbergs: Back to the 80s is free-to-play experience (F2P), but some game items are available for purchase using real money.

But don't get too comfortable at the top - your beloved "smother" Beverly is always trying to "help" and one wrong step will leave you embarrassed by your parents, at the bottom of the cool list! You'll go from ruling the mall to hiding out in the computer lab faster than you can say "gag me with a spoon"!

Tap your way through 80s themed arcade style boss fights against Beverly, Murray, and even Coach Mellor. As hard as you try to be cool, you'll lose it all at the end of each episode. But don’t have a cow, you’ll be rewarded with some choice 80s nostalgia to decorate your bedroom!

IDLE ADVENTURE SET IN THE 80s WITH NEVER ENDING FUN
Follow hilariously relatable characters through comedic cutscenes with plotlines and characters straight from the tv show. Relive the life you had, or wish you had as a teenager in the 80s. Whenever you need your 80s fix, new stories and live-events are always being added to The Goldbergs idle game!

TAKE PART IN 80s THEMED LIVE EVENTS
Ramp the nostalgia levels to the max with free and addicting time-limited events. Think you can jump to the top of the Cool List by becoming the Smashball campion? Can you defeat your enemies to rule the arcade? Play and tap through hilarious live events to win prizes that will help you become the coolest teenager in school.

WHO NEEDS MONEY? MAKE FRIENDS AND BECOME POPULAR
Click and tap to build and manage activities alongside Jenkintown's radical residents. From classic 80s activities like Hanging at the Mall or watching The Big Game to others straight from “The Goldbergs” TV show like Smashball and 80s Movie Parodies!

FREE IDLE TYCOON FUN
Join in the tap and idle games fun where you collect cards and characters to boost your cool rating. Too lazy to work? No duh, so are we! Join in the idle game fun when you collect cards and characters to automate your hangouts. The game plays itself while you're away! Become a true idle tycoon.

Join The Goldbergs' Adam, Erica, and Barry on a free idle quest to be cool and relive a world of acid-washed jeans, giant cell phones, and huge hair!

---------------

The Goldbergs TM & © 2020 Sony Pictures Television Inc. All Rights Reserved.

Please note that The Goldbergs: Back to the 80s is free-to-play experience (F2P), but some game items are available for purchase using real money.

creator: East Side Games Studio
descriptionHtml:
Help Adam, Barry, and Erica Goldberg get to the top of their school’s “Cool List” and become the most popular kids in town!

The official idle tap game of The Goldbergs hit comedy TV show. The Goldbergs: Back to the 80s is an idle game where you build your popularity by managing the social life of the Goldbergs teenagers Adam, Barry and Erica in the 80s.

Tap to collect Cool Points, make Friends, and become totally popular in this narrative driven idle game! Upgrade and automate your idle hangouts to shoot straight to the top of the teenage food chain in Jenkintown!

Were you ever popular in high school? Ever make it to the top of the Cool List? Now's your chance! As the true king or queen of the social ladder, you'll collect and upgrade characters straight from the TV show and boost your cool rating to open new hangouts. Get new characters by collecting cards, then level them up by collecting nostalgic 80s themed items like vhs tapes, arcade tokens, and sunglasses!

Your cool rating is key to completing the idle game popularity challenges and climbing the Cool List! But don't get too comfortable at the top - your beloved "smother" Beverly is always trying to "help" and one wrong step will leave you embarrassed by your parents, at the bottom of the cool list! You'll go from ruling the mall to hiding out in the computer lab faster than you can say "gag me with a spoon"!

Tap your way through 80s themed arcade style boss fights against Beverly, Murray, and even Coach Mellor. As hard as you try to be cool, you'll lose it all at the end of each episode. But don’t have a cow, you’ll be rewarded with some choice 80s nostalgia to decorate your bedroom!

IDLE ADVENTURE SET IN THE 80s WITH NEVER ENDING FUN
Follow hilariously relatable characters through comedic cutscenes with plotlines and characters straight from the tv show. Relive the life you had, or wish you had as a teenager in the 80s. Whenever you need your 80s fix, new stories and live-events are always being added to The Goldbergs idle game!

TAKE PART IN 80s THEMED LIVE EVENTS
Ramp the nostalgia levels to the max with free and addicting time-limited events. Think you can jump to the top of the Cool List by becoming the Smashball campion? Can you defeat your enemies to rule the arcade? Play and tap through hilarious live events to win prizes that will help you become the coolest teenager in school.

WHO NEEDS MONEY? MAKE FRIENDS AND BECOME POPULAR
Click and tap to build and manage activities alongside Jenkintown's radical residents. From classic 80s activities like Hanging at the Mall or watching The Big Game to others straight from “The Goldbergs” TV show like Smashball and 80s Movie Parodies!

FREE IDLE TYCOON FUN
Join in the tap and idle games fun where you collect cards and characters to boost your cool rating. Too lazy to work? No duh, so are we! Join in the idle game fun when you collect cards and characters to automate your hangouts. The game plays itself while you're away! Become a true idle tycoon.

Join The Goldbergs' Adam, Erica, and Barry on a free idle quest to be cool and relive a world of acid-washed jeans, giant cell phones, and huge hair!

---------------

The Goldbergs TM & © 2020 Sony Pictures Television Inc. All Rights Reserved.

Please note that The Goldbergs: Back to the 80s is free-to-play experience (F2P), but some game items are available for purchase using real money.

title: The Goldbergs: Back to the 80s

container.value:
East Side Games
550 - 555 West 12th Avenue
Vancouver, BC
V5Z 3X7

creator: East Side Games Studio
descriptionHtml:
Help Adam, Barry, and Erica Goldberg get to the top of their school’s “Cool List” and become the most popular kids in town!

The official idle tap game of The Goldbergs hit comedy TV show. The Goldbergs: Back to the 80s is an idle game where you build your popularity by managing the social life of the Goldbergs teenagers Adam, Barry and Erica in the 80s.

Tap to collect Cool Points, make Friends, and become totally popular in this narrative driven idle game! Upgrade and automate your idle hangouts to shoot straight to the top of the teenage food chain in Jenkintown!

Were you ever popular in high school? Ever make it to the top of the Cool List? Now's your chance! As the true king or queen of the social ladder, you'll collect and upgrade characters straight from the TV show and boost your cool rating to open new hangouts. Get new characters by collecting cards, then level them up by collecting nostalgic 80s themed items like vhs tapes, arcade tokens, and sunglasses!

Your cool rating is key to completing the idle game popularity challenges and climbing the Cool List! But don't get too comfortable at the top - your beloved "smother" Beverly is always trying to "help" and one wrong step will leave you embarrassed by your parents, at the bottom of the cool list! You'll go from ruling the mall to hiding out in the computer lab faster than you can say "gag me with a spoon"!

Tap your way through 80s themed arcade style boss fights against Beverly, Murray, and even Coach Mellor. As hard as you try to be cool, you'll lose it all at the end of each episode. But don’t have a cow, you’ll be rewarded with some choice 80s nostalgia to decorate your bedroom!

IDLE ADVENTURE SET IN THE 80s WITH NEVER ENDING FUN
Follow hilariously relatable characters through comedic cutscenes with plotlines and characters straight from the tv show. Relive the life you had, or wish you had as a teenager in the 80s. Whenever you need your 80s fix, new stories and live-events are always being added to The Goldbergs idle game!

TAKE PART IN 80s THEMED LIVE EVENTS
Ramp the nostalgia levels to the max with free and addicting time-limited events. Think you can jump to the top of the Cool List by becoming the Smashball campion? Can you defeat your enemies to rule the arcade? Play and tap through hilarious live events to win prizes that will help you become the coolest teenager in school.

WHO NEEDS MONEY? MAKE FRIENDS AND BECOME POPULAR
Click and tap to build and manage activities alongside Jenkintown's radical residents. From classic 80s activities like Hanging at the Mall or watching The Big Game to others straight from “The Goldbergs” TV show like Smashball and 80s Movie Parodies!

FREE IDLE TYCOON FUN
Join in the tap and idle games fun where you collect cards and characters to boost your cool rating. Too lazy to work? No duh, so are we! Join in the idle game fun when you collect cards and characters to automate your hangouts. The game plays itself while you're away! Become a true idle tycoon.

Join The Goldbergs' Adam, Erica, and Barry on a free idle quest to be cool and relive a world of acid-washed jeans, giant cell phones, and huge hair!

---------------

The Goldbergs TM & © 2020 Sony Pictures Television Inc. All Rights Reserved.

Please note that The Goldbergs: Back to the 80s is free-to-play experience (F2P), but some game items are available for purchase using real money.

Contact Us - goldbergsgame@lumen.games
Terms of Service - https://service-terms.eastsidegames.com
Privacy Policy - https://privacy-policy.eastsidegames.com/

title: The Goldbergs: Back to the 80s

container.value:
East Side Games
550 - 555 West 12th Avenue
Vancouver, BC
V5Z 3X7

creator: East Side Games Studio
descriptionHtml:
Help Adam, Barry, and Erica Goldberg get to the top of their school’s “Cool List” and become the most popular kids in town!

The official idle tap game of The Goldbergs hit comedy TV show. The Goldbergs: Back to the 80s is an idle game where you build your popularity by managing the social life of the Goldbergs teenagers Adam, Barry and Erica in the 80s.

Tap to collect Cool Points, make Friends, and become totally popular in this narrative driven idle game! Upgrade and automate your idle hangouts to shoot straight to the top of the teenage food chain in Jenkintown!

Were you ever popular in high school? Ever make it to the top of the Cool List? Now's your chance! As the true king or queen of the social ladder, you'll collect and upgrade characters straight from the TV show and boost your cool rating to open new hangouts. Get new characters by collecting cards, then level them up by collecting nostalgic 80s themed items like vhs tapes, arcade tokens, and sunglasses!

Your cool rating is key to completing the idle game popularity challenges and climbing the Cool List! But don't get too comfortable at the top - your beloved "smother" Beverly is always trying to "help" and one wrong step will leave you embarrassed by your parents, at the bottom of the cool list! You'll go from ruling the mall to hiding out in the computer lab faster than you can say "gag me with a spoon"!

Tap your way through 80s themed arcade style boss fights against Beverly, Murray, and even Coach Mellor. As hard as you try to be cool, you'll lose it all at the end of each episode. But don’t have a cow, you’ll be rewarded with some choice 80s nostalgia to decorate your bedroom!

IDLE ADVENTURE SET IN THE 80s WITH NEVER ENDING FUN
Follow hilariously relatable characters through comedic cutscenes with plotlines and characters straight from the tv show. Relive the life you had, or wish you had as a teenager in the 80s. Whenever you need your 80s fix, new stories and live-events are always being added to The Goldbergs idle game!

TAKE PART IN 80s THEMED LIVE EVENTS
Ramp the nostalgia levels to the max with free and addicting time-limited events. Think you can jump to the top of the Cool List by becoming the Smashball campion? Can you defeat your enemies to rule the arcade? Play and tap through hilarious live events to win prizes that will help you become the coolest teenager in school.

WHO NEEDS MONEY? MAKE FRIENDS AND BECOME POPULAR
Click and tap to build and manage activities alongside Jenkintown's radical residents. From classic 80s activities like Hanging at the Mall or watching The Big Game to others straight from “The Goldbergs” TV show like Smashball and 80s Movie Parodies!

FREE IDLE TYCOON FUN
Join in the tap and idle games fun where you collect cards and characters to boost your cool rating. Too lazy to work? No duh, so are we! Join in the idle game fun when you collect cards and characters to automate your hangouts. The game plays itself while you're away! Become a true idle tycoon.

Join The Goldbergs' Adam, Erica, and Barry on a free idle quest to be cool and relive a world of acid-washed jeans, giant cell phones, and huge hair!

---------------

The Goldbergs TM & © 2020 Sony Pictures Television Inc. All Rights Reserved.

Please note that The Goldbergs: Back to the 80s is free-to-play experience (F2P), but some game items are available for purchase using real money.

Contact Us - goldbergsgame@lumen.games
Terms of Service - https://service-terms.eastsidegames.com
Privacy Policy - https://privacy-policy.eastsidegames.com/
descriptionShort: The totally awesome 80s themed idle game based on the hit TV show!

But don't get too comfortable at the top - your beloved "smother" Beverly is always trying to "help" and one wrong step will leave you embarrassed by your parents, at the bottom of the cool list! You'll go from ruling the mall to hiding out in the computer lab faster than you can say "gag me with a spoon"!

Tap your way through 80s themed arcade style boss fights against Beverly, Murray, and even Coach Mellor. As hard as you try to be cool, you'll lose it all at the end of each episode. But don’t have a cow, you’ll be rewarded with some choice 80s nostalgia to decorate your bedroom!

IDLE ADVENTURE SET IN THE 80s WITH NEVER ENDING FUN
Follow hilariously relatable characters through comedic cutscenes with plotlines and characters straight from the tv show. Relive the life you had, or wish you had as a teenager in the 80s. Whenever you need your 80s fix, new stories and live-events are always being added to The Goldbergs idle game!

TAKE PART IN 80s THEMED LIVE EVENTS
Ramp the nostalgia levels to the max with free and addicting time-limited events. Think you can jump to the top of the Cool List by becoming the Smashball campion? Can you defeat your enemies to rule the arcade? Play and tap through hilarious live events to win prizes that will help you become the coolest teenager in school.

WHO NEEDS MONEY? MAKE FRIENDS AND BECOME POPULAR
Click and tap to build and manage activities alongside Jenkintown's radical residents. From classic 80s activities like Hanging at the Mall or watching The Big Game to others straight from “The Goldbergs” TV show like Smashball and 80s Movie Parodies!

FREE IDLE TYCOON FUN
Join in the tap and idle games fun where you collect cards and characters to boost your cool rating. Too lazy to work? No duh, so are we! Join in the idle game fun when you collect cards and characters to automate your hangouts. The game plays itself while you're away! Become a true idle tycoon.

Join The Goldbergs' Adam, Erica, and Barry on a free idle quest to be cool and relive a world of acid-washed jeans, giant cell phones, and huge hair!

---------------

The Goldbergs TM & © 2020 Sony Pictures Television Inc. All Rights Reserved.

Please note that The Goldbergs: Back to the 80s is free-to-play experience (F2P), but some game items are available for purchase using real money.
